title: Handle a Quay Crane Breakdown
description: During vessel operations, a quay crane suddenly stops working. The shift manager must manage the situation to minimize delays.

tasks.description: Receive an alert that a crane has broken down and is no longer operational.
tasks.expected_outcome: Manager is notified that QC-02 has a 'Spreader Fault' and is stopped.

tasks.description: Immediately create a high-priority maintenance work order and dispatch the on-duty engineering team.
tasks.expected_outcome: A priority 1 work order is sent to the maintenance crew.

tasks.description: Re-assign the broken crane's remaining work instructions to other operating cranes on the vessel.
tasks.expected_outcome: The work queue for QC-02 is redistributed to QC-01 and QC-03 to continue operations.
